alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire and east central Hampden Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monson, or 13 miles east of Springfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Holden, Wilbraham, Charlton, Palmer, Spencer, Leicester, Ware, Sturbridge, Monson, Rutland, West Boylston, Barre, Warren, Paxton, North Brookfield, Hubbardston, West Brookfield, Brimfield and Brookfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
